name: Warface - Halloween Pack
detailed_description:
Steam-exclusive Halloween Pack is now available!


Halloween is here! Dress up for the occasion with the items available exclusively in the Halloween Pack, and share your festive spirit!

Let’s go over the items included in the pack:

  • The Dread Mask — nothing strikes fear in the eyes of your foes more, while granting defensive bonuses. Check ‘em out!
  • The Halloween Vest — keeps you well-protected, strikes terror no less than the mask!
  • Halloween ZX84K, PHS-12, ZX84C and ZX84 SNR— weapons set to match your new outfit for the Day of the Dead.
  • A sleek Halloween Army Knife, just to give you some competitive *edge*!
  • 150 Explosive and smoke Halloween grenades, have at ‘em!
  • 1000 Kredits.

Happy Trick-or-treating!

short_description: Halloween is here! Dress up for the occasion with the items available exclusively in the Halloween Pack, and share your festive spirit!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
